description: The director Chad Stahelski narrates a sequence involving John Wick in combat with Caine, a blind assassin.
title: Watch Keanu Reeves and Donnie Yen Battle in ‘John Wick: Chapter 4’
title_page: Watch Keanu Reeves and Donnie Yen Battle in ‘John Wick: Chapter 4’ - The New York Times
maintext:
In “Anatomy of a Scene,” we ask directors to reveal the secrets that go into making key scenes in their movies. See new episodes in the series on Fridays. You can also watch our collection of more than 150 videos on YouTube and subscribe to our YouTube channel.
“John Wick: Chapter 4” takes a variety of martial arts styles, adds a dash of Sergio Leone and Akira Kurosawa and puts them all in a blender.
The film, which has more than a dozen major action set pieces, scales back a bit (but not too much) in this confrontation between John Wick (Keanu Reeves) and the blind assassin Caine (Donnie Yen), an old acquaintance who has been sent to kill John.
